nodes.text: The Norkronia system was a star system located within the galaxy's regions known as the Core Worlds and the Negs. It was connected to the Alland and Metellos systems by the Metellos Trade Route hyperlane, and was home to the creatures known as Norkronian whistle-snakes.
The Norkronia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square K-10.
